DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether HIV vaccine , ALVAC vCP205 , safe prevent HIV infection . The vCP205 vaccine test another vaccine , gp160MN/LAI-2 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study See Whether Two HIV Vaccines Are Safe Can Prevent HIV Infection
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist 2 part : Part A : Dose-escalation protocol use oligomeric gp160MN/LAI-2 . Part B : Placebo-controlled , randomize , double-blind ( within arm ) study vCP205 prim gp160MN/LAI-2 boosting . Volunteers follow least 1 year .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers may eligible study : Are HIVnegative . Are good health . Are age 18 55 . Are available least 1 year . Are resident United States America . Agree practice sexual abstinence use birth control . Exclusion Criteria Volunteers eligible study : Have ever give HIV vaccine certain vaccine . ( However , rabies vaccines allow . ) Participate activity place highrisk HIV infection , injection drug use unprotected sex someone HIV infection . Have certain psychiatric , medical , substance abuse problem . Are allergic eggs vaccine . Are employee participate site access study information . Are take certain medication . Have receive blood transfusion within 3 month enter study . Are pregnant breastfeeding .
